page.title: 08CLUBS_OVER 60'S
page.content: On Friday afternoons ladies and gentlemen over 60 meet at the{ELLIOT {CENTRE},a corrugated building put up when the estate was new and named after a former mayor.The entry fee is 15p.First they have a jumble sale,an auction,or{bring and buy}or something to raise money.Then the people talk about old times mostly over a cup of tea sometimes a visitor comes to give a talk.Then they have games of{Bingo} played for prizes of food.Buttons are used for markers so the cards can be used again and again.If someone is ill and cannot come they always send flowers to them.They also have a Christmas dinner every year and a{ {summer trip}which this year is going to Dumfries.
